author: FontEaterer

comments.content:
Your sample is quite small and low-res, but Engravers MT seems a decent match:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/engravers-mt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113542/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/engravers-mt/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/engravers-mt/")

If you want a similar look but a bit updated, House Industries Luxury Diamond would be a nice alternate:  
 [http://www.houseind.com/fonts/luxuryfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113542/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/luxuryfonts "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/luxuryfonts")
